titles.title: He'll take care of the rest

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You know it ain't no use
bangin' your head
up against that cold stone wall
cause nobody's perfect
except for the lord
and even the best's bound to fall

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
now remeber, He is the vine
and you are the branch
He'd love to get you through it
if you give Him a chance
just be doing your best
and pray that it's blest
He'll take care of the rest
